column1: Uchi////I could have sworn I wrote a review for Uchi...but hey maybe not.  This is my favorite place in Houston hands down.  I LOVE it here.  Ive been probably close to 10 times and I always order my favorite dishes but also try and order some new ones as well.  I am never disappointed.  Also their social hour is beyond amazing!  I have gone there to sit at the bar by myself MANY times.  So here are some of my favorites:
